definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
Sifang district of Qingdao city 青島市|青岛市, Shandong
to aspire to travel far and make one's mark (idiom)
Sifangtai district of Shuangyashan city 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang
Sifangtai district of Shuangyashan city 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang

sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚的“付费围墙”跟随他走四方。

sentences.english: 9-2. In those days wandering minstrels were welcome everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 当时，浪迹四方的吟游歌手到处受欢迎。

sentences.english: The Square Street at the Center of the Ancient Town is a typical example of ancient streets in Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 位于古城中心的四方街是丽江古街的代表。

sentences.english: With the increasing of doping amounts, phases shift from tetragonal phase to rhombohedral phase.
sentences.chinese: 随着掺杂量的增加，相转变，从四方相三方相。

sentences.english: So far, Foursquare has no revenue, and the company is still developing its business model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，四方会还没有盈利，公司还在开发商业模型。

sentences.english: I only like Dave Brubeck with this quartet , and the drummer is what is driving him.
sentences.chinese: 我只喜欢戴夫布鲁贝克此四方，和鼓手正是推动他。

sentences.english: Your transistor radio can accompany you wherever you go.
sentences.chinese: 晶体管收音机伴你走四方。

sentences.english: The most famous Food Street of Lijiang is located in Square Street side.
sentences.chinese: 丽江著名的美食街坐落在四方街旁边。

sentences.english: All you want is enough chopped off to make it squared off and straight.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的只是把毛边切掉，使之成为平整的四方形。

sentences.english: A spar rising aft from a mast to support the head of a quadrilateral fore-and-aft sail.
sentences.chinese: 从船尾桅杆伸出支撑船头四方形的船帆的圆材。

sentences.english: Ban Sa wanders the four directions, noisily left the innumerable jokes story.
sentences.chinese: 班萨云游四方，闹出了无数笑话的故事。

sentences.english: All kinds of PWO crystals showed the body-centered tetragonal structure in the Raman spectra.
sentences.chinese: 拉曼光谱证实晶体的结构为体心四方结构。

sentences.english: Why the street has a name of “Sifang”?
I have to come out a blue, cloud son inside the four seas float in the sky, the brave mans lock tightly everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我必须走出蓝色，四海内云儿飞扬，猛士们紧锁四方。

sentences.english: The four directions causes that affect Wen Yiduo's politic chosen has been analysed in this text.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了影响闻一多政治抉择的四方面原因。

sentences.english: On horseback, we travel around to bring joy to our herders.
sentences.chinese: 我们骑在马背上，走四方，给牧民带来快乐。

definition: the eight points of the compass/all directions
land under heaven/the whole world/the whole of China/realm/rule
the five regions: the east, south, west, north and center/all parts/China and the lands beyond its frontiers
the whole world/throughout the land/everything under the sun

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
outstanding heroes/warlords vying for supremacy (in former times)/stars (of sports or pop music)
yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
